item.title: Hello Blogging
item.description: I guess this is the hello world for blogging. For a quick introduction of who i am check my about page. I started blogging-ish this year but slothed down a bit(Procastination is a habit and not good my friend). But with the ideas, lessons and what not i have picked along the way, i think its time i did something good and started writing. With this blog i hope we shall learn, share, and engage together.
